title: Antagonist Robot Voice Lines
description: For game developers aiming to craft compelling NPC characters with depth and authenticity, our "Antagonist Robot Voice Sound Effects Pack" is the perfect tool.
longDescription:
Audio demo


This specialized collection presents finely tuned, game-optimized audio. Within, you'll discover over 402 male voice-over files, totaling 952 MB of premium samples, all delivered in a pristine 16bit/44k.wav format.


  • 402 male voice-over audio files
  • 770.8 MB of voice samples
  • All in 16bit/44k .wav file format


The "Antagonist Robot Voice Lines" voiceover sound library offers over 402 immersive, game-optimized voice-over files created specifically for an announcer or NPC game character. This extensive collection features custom character-specific dialogues and stock non-player character lines, perfect for crafting captivating cinematic sequences and character depth in gameplay audio moments.


The vocal profile of the Antagonist Robot is deep, raspy, and has a robotic yet human-like tone. It is ideal for in-game NPCs, robots, helpers, sidekicks, androids, and any other characters that call for a futuristic aesthetic. If you want to further process it with vocal effects, our voice is available in clean audio format and is prepared for your game as is. It is a great asset to any sci-fi game or movie productions.

UCS Compliant

All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant and is organized into categories to make it super easy to navigate to the right sounds. With 402 voice over audio files and 105 custom dialogue lines such as “Target Acquired, Autopilot Engaged, Activating Ship Defenses”. This pack has plenty of options to help your game characters come to life. 


Note: this pack does not include vocalizations. Only scripted dialogue lines for NPC characters.


Product details:

402 male voice-over audio files

770.8 MB of voice samples

All in 16bit/44k .wav file format

Includes Soundminer Metadata

Universal Category System (UCS) compliant

AAA Game Character Voice-Over Sound Effects Library

Perfect for AI, Announcer, Sci-fi, Robot, Futuristic, Side Kick, Games

105 stock NPC dialogue lines

297 custom character specific dialogue lines

Works with any DAW or Game Engine

All Royalty Free & YouTube friendly

RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
